name: convert_coco_annotations
short_description: Convert COCO annotations to Roboto annotations.
description: This Action converts [COCO](https://cocodataset.org) annotations in .json files to Roboto-supported annotations. Under the hood, this is the [Ultralytics YOLO](https://github.com/ultralytics/ultralytics) format.

parameters.name: OUTPUT_FILE_NAME
parameters.description: Output name of Roboto-supported annotation file.
